anxiously adverb
(WORRIED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 in a way that shows you are worried or nervous: We waited anxiously by the phone.
More examplesFewer examplesMy little nephew anxiously asked who would babysit him if I wouldn't be there.They peered anxiously out the window at wind and rain.She paced from room to room anxiously."Is something wrong?" she asked anxiously.

(EAGER)
